OOC: Sadly he is part cat and falling again I doubt Gabriel can fly 
faster than Amperion can fall without crashing into the ground and 
suffering severe damage but I thing I can make this interesting.

::Amperion::
      As he was falling he noticed the glint of Gabriel flying at him 
he landed and reacted in time to grab a piece of wood to hold behind 
him while he started running.  When Gabriel planted the bomb on what 
he thought was Amperion's back he dropped the piece of wood.  He 
never expected that Gabriel would be stupid enough to detonate it 
before he got himself out of range.  Unfortunately he did.  The blast 
caught Amperion full in the back charring his entire back to a crisp 
blackened state (think over cooked steak) fortunately for him there 
wasn't a tree as close by and he managed to turn around before 
crashing again.  He landed, impaired but still battle worthy, and 
took off at a run at Savior.  He is driven solely by rage and his 
already formidable fighting skills are even better.  He unleashes a 
seires of slashes that the even the best swordsman would be hard-
pressed to dodge or block.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  The bots dodged the fire. Gabriel took a shot to the leg. It was 
minor 
> damage nothing serious. He dove down and pulled out another bomb. 
He inhanced 
> its power and planted it on the bot's back while savior distracted 
him with 
> fire energy blast. He pressed the button. He was too close so he 
would gain 
> damage from the explosion. He heard the bomb and was tossed to the 
tree and  
> he struggled to get up.
